title: don't serialize cdn value if false
Use existing image and animation links from metadata
body:
This PR changes the upload logic to skip the upload of image and animation files when the metadata contains a complete link.

Closes #300

title: update create-config configurations link in cli output
body: fixes #402

title: fix: add missing accounts to unnlock-funds when token mint enabled
body: The `unfreeze-funds` is missing some additional accounts required to work when SPL token mint is enabled.

title: ci: avoid redundant runs
body: Fixes the CI so it doesn't run actions twice on pushes to an open PR.

title: Allow for CDN on File Attribute
body:
## Goal
Support setting cdn boolean on file attribute so explores and other NFT viewers will give priority to video nfts.

## Change
- Add cdn as option field on file attribute.

title: Run CI workflow on pull requests
body:
#379 accidentally removed the `pull_request` trigger for the workflow.
This adds back the trigger to allow pull requests to be built and test.

title: chore: bump Anchor and Solana versions
body: This PR upgrades Anchor to 0.25 and Solana 1.10 to support programs that do reallocating of account size.

title: fix: remove chrono time dep
body: There's a possibility of a segfault in the time dependency on chrono and we don't actually use it, so this PR removes it.

title: Fix/revert to gpa
body: This replaces the transaction crawling with the standard gPA calls because of issues users have been having with transaction crawling. The downside is that it requires the use of a RPC node that supports gPA calls.

title: fix: set cache items on-chain to false, for non-existent cms
body:
Scenario:

Deploy a candy machine successfully and verify that it was created. When finished with it, run `sugar withdraw` and close it down but don't modify the cache file. 

Run deploy again, to create a new candy machine. The command will correctly determine that the existing candy machine is not on-chain so will create a new one, but because all the cache item `on-chain` values are `true`, it will not upload the config items resulting in an invalid candy machine that says it was successfully deployed. 

This fixes the issue by writing all `on-chain` values to `false` in the cache file if we have an existing candy machine pubkey in the cache file but it is not found on-chain. 

@KartikSoneji if you have a chance to take a look at the logic, I'd appreciate it.

title: Add warning about bots for vunerable candy machines
body: Adds a warning while updating or creating a candy machine that might potentially be vunerable to bots.

title: print signature mint instead of sending it to ProgressBar
body:
This fixes the issue of being able to capture signature reading the terminal output programatically.

For example.. today.. if you run a mint and redirect the output with `> output.txt` you loose the signature id because ProgressBar will not print if is redirected or run outside a terminal. This behavior makes it impossible to automate tasks using sugar to mint NFTs and read the output.

title: chore: switch linux runners to Buildjet
Add option to specify a custom domain
body:
Currently, the `aws` uploader creates URI using the standard AWS domain (`s3.amazonaws.com`). This PR adds an option to specify custom domains.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/729235/194158177-285b39e0-acba-4846-aae8-75eb0b999763.png)

title: Refactor CI/CD
body:
Refactor the CI/CD workflow
- Cache dependences and build outputs
- Build binary only once
- Release artifacts for each commit and PR to allow for easy testing
- Build and test on all platforms

title: Sort cache items
body:
Sorts the cache items:
- move all non-numeric keys to the beginning and sort alphabetically
- sort numeric keys as integers

title: [#311]  Feature/airdrop
body: Implementing https://github.com/metaplex-foundation/sugar/issues/311

title: Fix unintentional running of `cargo fmt`
body:
Backticks (`` ` ``) are a legacy form of the process substituion syntax (`$()`).
Printing the help message actually runs the command instead.
https://github.com/metaplex-foundation/sugar/blob/996c632535b0ae18057ce1c80edeedd67725ef7a/.cargo-husky/hooks/pre-commit#L10

title: fix(upload): allow use of existing animation url
body: Currently Sugar will strip out the `animation_url` from a `json` metadata file if no animation file is found in the assets folder. This PR prevents this, so it is possible to specify an existing animation url directly on the `json` metadata.

title: fix(upload): animation link initialization
body: Closes #359

title: Handle transaction timeout during deploy
body:
Saving the candy machine public key to the cache before sending the deploy transaction allows the cli to automatically detect if the deploy succeeded even if the transaction times out.

Behviour change:
Providing a valid public key that is not a candy machine in the cache results in a warning message and new candy machine being deployed.
The old behaviour was to print the message `Candy machine from cache does't exist on chain!`

title: Continuous series check
body:
Adding a check that the assets are a continuous series `0.json`, `1.json` ... `N.json`.

Need some instructions on the testing, want to add couple of tests that cover:

1. Proper series.
2. Missing item.
3. Duplicate item.
4. Out of range item (`N+X.json` but only `N` items in directory).

Code now should support these cases, but need to confirm via tests.

title: fix: update unfreeze-funds handler
body: DRAFT: requires `mpl-candy-machine` 4.4 released before merge and needs Cargo.toml file updated to not point to local package.

title: Fix typo during the validate cmd
body: Fixing a typo while running the validate command. The metadata contained the creator address yet it was throwing warning for creator address so, digged a little bit to find out that it was related to category.

title: Add Pinata upload method
body:
This PR adds Pinata as one of the upload methods. The configuration includes:
```rust
pub struct PinataConfig {
    pub jwt: String,
    pub api_gateway: String,
    pub content_gateway: Option<String>,
    pub parallel_limit: Option<u16>,
}
```
If the `content_gateway` is not specified, the `api_gateway` is used to generate the asset's URIs. The optional `parallel_limit` allows users to limit the number of parallel uploads according to their gateway rate limits.

title: Allow `.glb` for `animation_url`
body: Add support for `.glb` files.

title: fix: correctly get decimals from mint account
body: The `update` command was incorrectly trying to parse decimals from the token account instead of the mint account. This code was duplicated in two places and the bug was only fixed in one. This PR abstracts this code into a helper function to reduce code duplication, and also fixes the bug.

title: feat: support thaw all on localnet
Remove double quotes from collection values
body: Strips `"`s from collection values so the script is able to check removal and set collection.

title: Allow `.mp3` for `animation_url`
body: Closes #344

title: Fix `properties.category` being silently ignored
body:
If the `properties.category` field is not set for video, 3d and html nfts, they will not display properly on most wallets and marketplaces.
It [was part of the spec](https://docs.metaplex.com/programs/token-metadata/changelog/v1.0#:~:text=view%20the%20asset.-,properties.category,-%2D%20Supported%20categories%3A), but [seems to have dissapeared](https://docs.metaplex.com/programs/token-metadata/token-standard#:~:text=%5D%2C%0A%20%20%20%20%22-,category,-%22%3A%20%22video).

title: Feat/add localnet cluster
body: Adds a `Localnet` option to the `Cluster` enum to allow testing commands on localnet.

title: fix(reveal,sign): remove GenesysGo rpc urls
body:
Addresses. #347 

Tested `sign` command on devnet and it worked as expected.

title: Code cleanup
body:
This pull requests implements all of the suggestions from the candy machine audit report by ottersec/Ape16z for the `metaplex-foundation/sugar` repo. A more detailed explanation of the changes in this PR can be found here: https://docsend.com/view/is7963h8tbbvp2g9.

Changes to `src/deploy/process.rs`:
* refactor unnecessary error handling

Changes to` src/upload/assets.rs`:
* remove unused struct definition
* verify that filename arrays contain exactly one element

Changes to `src/upload/process.rs`:
* simplify the logging

title: fix: convert wl discount to base units, instead of just SOL
New feature
body:
Adds the `freeze` feature with the following commands:

* freeze enable -- enables the freeze feature for a candy machine that has not started minting yet
* freeze disable -- removes the freeze feature 
* thaw -- thaws a single frozen NFT if freeze rules allow it, or all NFTs from a candy machine with the `--all` option
* unfreeze-funds -- unlocks treasury funds if freeze rules allow it

title: Fix division by zero error when verifying empty collection
body:
If `num_items` is 0 then we set `step` to `0` instead of `1_000_000 / num_items`

With this PR `sugar verify` works correctly for an empty collection:

```
>>> sugar verify

[1/2] 🍬 Loading candy machine
▪▪▪▪▪ Completed

[2/2] 📝 Verification
Verifying 0 config line(s): (Ctrl+C to abort)
[00:00:00] Config line verification successful █████████████████████████████████████████████████████ 0/0

Verification successful. You're good to go!

See your candy machine at:
  -> https://www.solaneyes.com/address/DqfEXKYn8Nct9xaY8A5xj2DUNkwZw8cJKXWS1Wwqt4oK?cluster=devnet

✅ Command successful.
```

Fixes #342

title: fix default devnet rpc url
body:
https://dev.genesysgo.net is not a valid address and therefore causing issues like this:
![grafik](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/93528482/187425200-00a0e849-ae7b-4012-a9f1-3d8827ccdf09.png)
`Error running command (re-run needed): error sending request for url (URL): error trying to connect: dns error: failed to lookup address information: nodename nor servname provided, or not known`

The correct url is https://devnet.genesysgo.net which I used now.

title: Support Sized Collections
body:
Creates sized collections by default when a collection asset pair is included in the assets directory. There's no real disadvantage I see to everyone having sized collections by default, but if someone really doesn't want a sized collection they can still create the collection parent NFT themselves as unsized and then use the `set-collection` command with Sugar to use it.

Waiting on this feature to be merged and deployed to candy machine devnet to test and finish this PR.

body: Closes #334.

title: fix: enable CLI testing with AWS upload option
body:
### Context
* Update the Sugar CLI test to allow for testing the AWS upload option. Based on [the docs](https://docs.metaplex.com/developer-tools/sugar/upload-methods#amazon-aws-s3), we need a more complex config object - no longer just the bucket:

```
{
  . . .
  "uploadMethod": "aws",
  . . .
  "awsConfig": 
  {
    "bucket": "<BUCKET_NAME>",
    "profile": "<PROFILE_NAME>",
    "directory": "<DIRECTORY_NAME>",
  }
  . . .
}
```
* Other misc updates are due to clippy errors - I couldn't commit unless I fixed them 

### Testing
I tested locally both with env vars set and in interactive mode. If someone sets `STORAGE=aws` but forgets an AWS specific var, this logic will still prompt them for the missing var.

title: fix: remove unwraps
body: Replace some `unwrap()`s with better errors.

title: fix(reveal): skip collection item during reveal
body:
The reveal process was trying to update the collection item and panicking because the index `-1` was outside the u32 bounds. This PR skips the collection index during updates since the collection NFT is not part of the normal reveal process. 

Fixes #328.

title: fix(upload): add 'jpeg' to image pattern
body: Addresses #321

title: refactor(bundlr): add file type to end of image and animation URLs
body:
Images and animation URLs will now look like:

```
https://arweave.net/5UnllZT23t5WTqd61Ho4_-J2GxZihEBSdFkZD9d8KI0?ext=png
```

Fixes #303.

title: feat: add profile and directory options for aws s3
body:
Addresses #322 and #307.

Changes the AWS config option from a single value to a struct:

```Rust
pub struct AwsConfig {
    pub bucket: String,
    pub profile: String,
    pub directory: String,
}
```

This allows the user to set a AWS credentials profile other than `default` to give them more flexibility. In addition, it allows specifying an optional folder name to store the assets in the S3 bucket. If no folder is provided they will be stored at the root level. This lets users store multiple collections in a single bucket.

![Selection_934](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1684605/184995582-5389d384-f257-49b0-a1db-f1b5a0690998.png)

Finally, this changes the file names to use the standard asset pair file names `0.json, 0.png, 1.json, 1.png` etc. to make it easier to figure out what file is what.

![Selection_935](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1684605/184997757-631a490d-5c80-443a-b60a-339e7cd4ca8d.png)

title: chore: bump token-metadata and candy-machine versions
body: To support sized collections we need `mpl-token-metadata` v1.3.4 which requires the latest version of `mpl-candy-machine`.

title: Feat: Date Parser
body: Addresses #315. Adds the `dateparser` library to accept a wide range of date inputs and then converts and stores them as ISO8601 in the UTC timezone. Changes the EndSetting struct local to Sugar to have both a `Number` and `Date` field to allow storing the date as a string in the config file for consistency.

title: ci: cargo-husky and pre-commit git hook
body: This PR sets up a custom git hook that will be moved into the .git/hooks directory the first time a clean run of `cargo test` is done. Thereafter, it runs `cargo +nightly fmt`, `cargo clippy` and `cargo test` as a pre-commit hook for git.

title: fix: make symbol optional in validator
body: Fixes #314 .

title: fix: mint to keypair instead of cm wallet
body: The `mint` command should mint to the keypair calling the command by default, instead of the wallet currently configured in the candy machine wallet.

title: fix: correctly convert config price to u64
body: Fixes #297

title: fix(sign): exit w/ error no NFTs found
body: The current sign command will continue to run if NFTs found. This PR will make it exit early with an error if no NFTs are found for the candy machine.

title: refactor: make minting async
body: Refactor minting to be async to speed up minting large amounts from the CLI.
